item.title: From Start to Finish
item.description: A summary of the whole project if you don’t want to read the individual blog posts.

item.title: Silent Night
item.description: My final thoughts on the project.

item.title: Testing it on Unsuspecting Friends
item.description: On my time testing it myself and on two “friends”.

item.title: In-Game Tutorial
item.description: How I implemented tutorial messages to show users the ‘right’ way to play.

item.title: Making it Pretty
item.description: What don’t we do to make things pretty?

item.title: Interaction Technique
item.description: My journey to implement my interaction technique.

item.title: Locomotion Technique
item.description: My unique way of utilizing a resetter to become a figure skater.

item.title: Redirected Walking
item.description: My attempts to utilize the RW Toolkit and how I only used the resetter.

item.title: Boundaries
item.description: My journey of implementing a custom play area selection after the inability to reuse Meta’s Guardian Boundaries.

item.title: Ideas & Project Direction
item.description: My initial ideas on where to take this project.

item.title: Unity & Quest Setup
item.description: Setup of the Unity Hub and the Meta Quest 2 as well as implementation of Roll-a-Ball classically and in VR.
